definition: showing little if any change, angry criticism
details:
adjective
- showing little if any change
= example: showing little if any change
= synonyms: stable, unchanging
- not in physical motion
= synonyms: inactive
- concerned with or producing or caused by static electricity
= example: concerned with or producing or caused by static electricity
= synonyms: electrostatic
noun
- angry criticism
= example: angry criticism
- a crackling or hissing noise caused by electrical interference
= synonyms: atmospherics, atmospheric static
